pdf.body:
SERVICE ORDER
THIS MASTER SERVICES AGREEMENT (“MSA”) IS MADE BETWEEN:
${subsidiary.name}, a company registered in ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?keep_after_last('>')}, company number ${subsidiary.custrecord_bbs_company_no} and whose registered office is at ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?replace('
', ' ')} (essensys)
AND
${record.entity}, a company registered in ${record.billaddress?keep_after_last('>')}, company number and whose registered office is at ${record.billaddress?replace('
', ' ')} (Customer)
After signature of this Services Order by both parties, Company shall provide Customer with the Services set out in this Service Order for the Term in accordance with the MSA terms (defined at https://essensys.tech/our-terms). The Services shall be provided at the Premises set out in this Order Form for the Charges set out below.
1. Premises
<#if record.custbody_bbs_premises_json?length gt 0> <#assign premises_summary = record.custbody_bbs_premises_json?eval> <#if premises_summary?has_content>
<#list premises_summary as premises> <#if premises_index==0>
Name Address City State/Province Country Postcode/
Zip code
</#if>
${premises.name} ${premises.address1}
${premises.address2}
${premises.address3} ${premises.city} ${premises.state}
${premises.zip}
</#list>
</#if> </#if>
Total Number of Premises: ${record.custbody_site_count?string.number}
2. Term
Effective Date Date of Signature
Term A fixed period of 3 years starting from Commencement Date.
3. Payment Terms
Payment terms are 30 days from invoice for all charges.
4. Fees: Subscription Services - Fixed Recurring
Connect Fixed Recurring Fees are invoiced Monthly in Advance.
First invoice is at Commencement Date.
<#if record.item?has_content>
Connect Service – Essential Edition Recurring Monthly Subscription Fee
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == true>
${item.item} ${currencySymbol}${item.amount}
</#if> </#list>
</#if>
The Connect Service Description is available at https://essensys.tech/connect-service-description/
The Connect SLA is available at https://essensys.tech/connect-sla/

p.b: 5. Fees: Connect On-Demand Marketplace Services - Monthly Variable Recurring

tr.td: Connect Variable Recurring Fees are invoiced Monthly in Arrears based on actual consumption.
● 50% upon service order Agreement and payable within 7 days
● 50% upon Commencement Date and payable within 7 days
Risks in these items pass to Customer on dispatch. Ownership of these items will pass to Customer on the latter of:
(2) Receipt of all payments due in respect thereof by Company
(3) Any set up fees exclude any applicable Excess Civil Charges or construction works on essensysCloud connectivity
Upon signing (or clicking the order button) this Order Form, the Customer acknowledges that it has read, understood and agrees to be bound by the terms of this MSA which consists of:
4. Schedule 2 – Connect Service Level Agreement: https://essensys.tech/connect-sla/

pdf.head:
<#setting number_format="0.00"> <#assign currencySymbol>${record.custbody_bbs_currency_symbol}</#assign> <#assign logoInfo>https://5423837-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1942&c=5423837_SB1&h=1e9c8c9c705d4925337f</#assign>
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
SERVICE ORDER
THIS MASTER SERVICES AGREEMENT ("MSA") IS MADE BETWEEN:
${subsidiary.name}, a company registered in ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?keep_after_last('>')}, company number ${subsidiary.custrecord_bbs_company_no} and whose registered office is at ${subsidiary.mainaddress_text?replace('
', ' ')} (essensys)
AND
${record.entity}, a company registered in ${record.billaddress?keep_after_last('>')}, company number ${record.entity.custentity_bbs_company_reg_no} and whose registered office is at ${record.billaddress?replace('
', ' ')} (Customer)

<#setting number_format="0.00"> <#assign currencySymbol>${record.custbody_bbs_currency_symbol}</#assign> <#assign logoInfo>https://5423837-sb1.app.netsuite.com/core/media/media.nl?id=1942&c=5423837_SB1&h=1e9c8c9c705d4925337f</#assign>
<#if .locale == "zh_CN">
<#elseif .locale == "zh_TW">
<#elseif .locale == "ja_JP">
<#elseif .locale == "ko_KR">
<#elseif .locale == "th_TH">
</#if>
After signature of this Services Order by both parties, the Company shall provide the Customer with the Services set out in this Service Order for the Term in accordance with the terms of the MSA. The Services shall be provided at the Premises set out in this Order Form for the Charges set out below.
pdf.body:
Contact: TODO Contact Email: TODO
Billing Contact: TODO Billing Contact Email: TODO
1. Term
Start Date ${record.startdate}
Initial Term ${record.custbody_so_term?string.number} <#if record.custbody_so_term gt 1>months<#else>month</#if>
2. Invoice Terms
One month in advance
3. Fees: Subscription Services - Fixed Recurring
<#if record.item?has_content> <#assign billingChargeAmount = 0>
Service QTY Schedule Site Item Price Total Monthly
Recurring Fee
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == false>
${item.item} ${item.quantity?string.number} ${item.custcol_bbs_billing_frequency} ${item.custcol_bbs_site_name} ${currencySymbol}${item.rate} ${currencySymbol}${item.amount}
<#assign billingChargeAmount += item.amount> </#if> </#list>
</#if>
Billing Charge Amount
${record.custbody_so_term?string.number} <#if record.custbody_so_term gt 1>months<#else>month</#if> ${currencySymbol}${billingChargeAmount}
Subscription services are invoiced upon commencement of the Service Order Agreement start date. Subscription Service fees are non-refundable and non-cancellable. The number of Premises specified above may be increased, but cannot be reduced during the Term.
4. Fees: Operate Setup Services
Setup service Fees are invoiced fully upon signature of the Service Order Agreement
<#if record.item?has_content>
Item Quantity Fee Total One Off Fee
<#list record.item as item> <#if item.custcol_bbs_setup_fee == true>
${item.item} ${item.quantity?string.number} ${currencySymbol}${item.rate} ${currencySymbol}${item.amount}
</#if> </#list>
</#if>

tr.td: Upon signing (or clicking the order button on) this Order Form, the Customer acknowledges that it has read, understood and agrees to be bound by the terms of the MSA which consists of:
